Page n of nn

RSO (AR)

Course components

This online course has four main parts:

 

1. Duties and responsibilities of a RSO (AR);

2. How to inspect an air rifle range;

3. How to conduct an air rifle activity; and

4. An exam of RSO (AR) knowledge.

 

In addition, you’ll find a formative quiz, links to supporting documents and websites, as well as a series of bonus questions to assist in your learning.

 

Remember that your e-Learning Facilitator (eLF) can assist you at any time during the training.
